description: Add profiles to your network and get in touch using a personalized message

defaultArgument.message:
Hey #firstName#,

I added you thanks to this awesome Phantombuster script!
➡️ https://phantombuster.com/api-store/2818/linkedin-network-booster

Nice to connect!

Best regards

spreadsheetUrl.label: Spreadsheet URL of people to invite (?)
spreadsheetUrl.helper: Enter either a Google Spreadsheet URL or a CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available)

columnName.label: Column name from which to get profile URLs
columnName.helper: By default, we'll use the first column of your spreadsheet (column A)

numberOfAddsPerLaunch.label: Number of invites per launch (10 max.) (?)

message.label: Message (?)
helpers: Use #firstName# to insert the first name of the person you are adding in your message
You are limited by LinkedIn to 300 characters
Leave empty to send invites without message (not recommended)

hunterApiKey.label: Email discovery: Hunter.io API key (optional) (?)
hunterApiKey.helper: Leave this field empty if you don't want to use Hunter.io

disableScraping.rightLabel: Disable profile scraping (not recommended — can speed up the API but prevents email discovery)
